30/3/2022 ,updated on 9/6/2024: Tindak Malaysia (2024), Laporan Pilihanraya Umum Dewan Undangan Negeri Sarawak 1979, Government Gazette 13th September 1979. For more information, please refer to SARAWAK_1979_Other_Sources_DUN_File

There are missing gaps for candidate age data. There is missing information from the EC report for constituencies that were uncontested (Batang Air, Layar, Balingian, and Meluan).
